resources.string: Allow Access to Attractions and Permissions
Click the "Attractions" Button to access Chicago\'s Top 8 Tourist Attractions.
Click the "Restaurants" Button to access Chicago\'s Top 6 Restaurants.
Broadcast Successful. Open Project3App2 Application to access the results for this selection.
Permission denied. You have to allow this permission and then restart the application in order for this application to fully function.
